<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Alchemical Familiar](/Feats.aspx?ID=5760) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemist" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=812" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 63 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You have used alchemy to create life, a simple creature formed from alchemical materials, reagents, and a bit of your own blood. You gain a [familiar](/Rules.aspx?ID=2121), which has the [construct](/Familiars.aspx?ID=109) familiar ability; this is permanent, doesn't require the familiar to have the [tough](/Familiars.aspx?ID=148) familiar ability, and doesn't count against your usual limit of familiar abilities (typically 2). The familiar uses your Intelligence modifier to determine its Perception, [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=34), and [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=48) modifiers.
name: Alchemical Familiar
